str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
To dwell in, settle in, be established in (permanently), inhabit. From kata and oikeo; to house permanently, i.e. Reside.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

word: [And I pray that] you, being rooted
parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To cause to take root; met: I plant, fix firmly, establish. From rhiza; to root.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To found, lay the foundation (lit. and met.). From themelios; to lay a basis for, i.e. erect, or consolidate.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From agapao; love, i.e. Affection or benevolence; specially a love-feast.
